articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank to invest 1,700cr in tech upgrades: CEO - The Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: Kotak Mahindra Bank's CEO, Ashok Vaswani, plans Rs 1,700 crore tech upgrades to address RBI's concerns. The bank recorded a 18% increase in net profit
